Software version: v05.09.13
Official site: microsoft
By assembling: Elgujakviso
Language: English
Treatment: not required

System requirements:
A computer equipped with a processor speed of 800 MHz or more.
More than 512MB of RAM is recommended.
Monitor and video card with a resolution of 1024 X 768 or higher and a 64MB memory.

Description:
Original image: Microsoft Windows XP Professional with Service Pack 3 VL English.
Update installed by August 2013. With the added drivers AHCI (hard disk controllers) to allow installation on modern motherboards and notebooks. Redesigned setting and visual style for Windows, Replace cursors, sounds, themes added. The system is tested for performance, stability and performance, is stable.

The assembly is not designed to be installed over the old system!
Place the assembly on a clean formatted drive under DOS (BIOS)!

Composition Language Packs:
Arabic, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danis, Dutch Standard,
Estonian, Finnish, French Standard, German, Greek, Hebrew,
Hungarian, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Polish,
Portuguese Brazil, Portuguese Standard, Romanian, Russian,
Spanish Modern Sort, Slovak, Slovenian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish.

If you need to install Language Packs,
after installing Language Packs and your chosen language, we go:
Start  Control Panel  Date, Time, Language  Regional Settings  in the top row, select the language of your choice, apply and ok!
After this reboot, when you turn off the plate may show a "memory can not be restored" disable the label,
this is due to change of language, reboot your computer and all!
